content: any fan of late 20th century children s public television will recognize these lovable aliens use them as holiday stockings toy storage kids laundry whatever really yip yip yip yip uh-huh uh-huh… now available in dutch thanks to ineke * questions please contact ineketuller@gmail com * there s also a crocheted version 1 **finished measurements** circumference 25 inches height 14 inches * excluding tentacles & hanging loop * **gauge** 8 sts/16 row = 4 inches in stockinette stitch **materials** bernat blanket/blanket brights/baby blanket 100% polyester 220yds/201m per 300g skein 1 skein in color of your choice *shown in baby lilac* us10 5/6 5mm circular needle 24 inches long stitch marker tapestry needle crochet hook * for attaching tentacles * 2 ping pong balls black paint pen or permanent marker 2 pipe cleaners 12 inches long awl ice pick corn pick * for poking holes in ping pong balls * black flannel fabric 16 inches by 24 inches scissors sewing needle black thread if you re having trouble with any of my patterns or simply want to show off your project please feel free to visit my ravelry group carissa browning designs 2 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/yip-yips-crochet 2 https //www ravelry com/groups/carissa-browning-designs
